extension.summary: When you stream media from a remote Kodi library, KeepAwake makes sure it doesn't fall asleep while you're streaming
extension.description: If Kodi streams files from a remote Kodi instance, KeepAwake makes sure that the remote instance doesn't initiate sleep mode (suspend) by sending it a quick left and right remote "shake" (just like pressing left and right on its remote/keyboard).
